name: BATIM: A Deeper Dive (FANGAME)
description:
A Deeper Dive is a fangame for the existing game Bendy and the Ink Machine!

Starting development back in December of last year with inspiration from both the Original and the now hindered Downward Fall, Deeper Dive has made rapid progress in being completed with Lighting as well as a starting point made to look exactly like the 2 games.

Shortly after, progress was dropped for other projects to be completed. Now I am back on track with development going full speed, taking out any time possible to focus on this project.

I have fingers crossed that everything goes to plan!
